errorUnsupportedLanguagePair.message: Translation for this language pair is not supported. You can enable more language pairs by setting up an external API key in the extension settings.

errorNeedAPIKey.message: To use external APIs, you need to register an API key. Please set on the option page.

modelDownloadError.message: Failed to download model. Please try again later

externalAPIFlagNotice.message: Translation was not possible with the local model. Translation may be possible if you enable the External API in the options settings.

translationRequired.description: Title for the translation setup alert

translationMessage.message: To use this extension, please type chrome://flags/#translation-api in your address bar and enable the Translation API. For translations other than English, Spanish and Japanese, please set them on the options page.
translationMessage.description: Message explaining the need to enable the Translation API

extensionDescription.message: Enhance your Bluesky experience with instant inline translations.

introText.message:
Enhance your Bluesky experience with instant inline translations. This extension provides seamless translations directly on the page using Chrome's built-in AI translator, without redirecting to external services.

Translate posts while reading or composing. For languages beyond Chrome's built-in support (English, Spanish, and Japanese), you can enable Google Gemini API integration.

setupGuideStep1.message: Visit chrome://flags/#translation-api in a new tab

localModelNotice.message:
Chrome's built-in translator offers fast, secure, offline translation with limited language support (currently English, Japanese, and Spanish only).
For additional language support, please switch to the External API tab.

externalApiNotice.message: Use Google Gemini API to translate languages not supported by Chrome's built-in translator. Gemini supports over 40 languages with a generous free tier (1,500 requests/day, 15/minute). Note: Translation content will be processed through Google's servers.
